urls.title: Oficinas de Iberia - Iberia
urls.description: Estamos a tu disposición en nuestra amplia red de oficinas.

data.text: @raquelgariani Hola Raquel, para poder dar seguimiento a tu equipaje es necesario que dispongas del PIR, número de reclamación de equipajes, contacta directamente con equipajes para que puedan facilítartelo https://t.co/pFvjwJPxns. Saludos
@rickeard Thank you Oliver, we will continue your case by DM. Regards.
@MGEichenberg Hola Malena, the seat selection depends of the fare that you contracted, please let us know the details by DM and we can gladly check. Regards.

@Kate23052495 Hola Kate, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details of your complaint, including, booking code, ticket number, registered email and claim number to verify the information? Thanks in advance
@keloram Thank you Kelly, we are checking your DM. We will continue the conversation there. Kind regards
@CarmenMIT Hola Carmen. Te informamos que la reserva de mascotas dependen de la disponibilidad en los vuelos ¿Nos podrías enviar más detalles por DM para poder revisar? Saludos.
@noskatesnodates Hola, we are checking your DM.
@keloram Kelly, please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with the flight you want to purchase.
@OneByJuan Thank you Juan, we remain at your disposal for future requests.

@BrieFreeAgain Hola, we are sorry to hear this. In this case you should contact our colleagues from the responsible department  https://t.co/14lDG0l3kq so they can help you with the delivery process. Regards
@keloram Kelly, did you try to purchase the flight through the app?
@KhalidT9 Khalid, as we told you before. You should wait until our colleagues re evaluate the case and the options you have; as soon as they have any response, they will contact you.
@DianaViscusi You're welcome, Diana
@amy_torczon Sorry to read this, Amy. Please send us a DM with your claim reference number and email address https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@CltFlyboy Hola, we're not able to start conversations via DM. So please send us a DM with more details about your query https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@_douglasrojas Hola Douglas. Please send us a DM with your Iberia booking code, full name and ticket number. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

data.text: @BalakumarAjith We're deeply sorry for the misunderstanding, Ajith. Apologies
@DanielRey93 Hola Daniel. We are sorry we can not tell you something different. Regards.

@BalakumarAjith We've asked you to contact QA, because we understood that you didn't want the new flights. Then, we realized that you contacted us before accessing the booking details online, which are available on your booking management page. Sorry for any inconvenience

@raquelgariani Hola Raquel. Para poder revisar, sería necesario conocer por mensaje privado el código PIR de tu reporte, junto con tu apellido y si tienes algún expediente abierto relacionado al PIR. Saludos,

data.text: @BalakumarAjith already left the airport, you should contact Qatar Airways, since they issued your ticket. The compensation doesn't apply, because the cancellation happened due to a reason beyond our control (hurricane Fiona). Kind regards

@BalakumarAjith When a flight is involuntary cancelled on the departure date, the flights are rescheduled  ''automatically'' by the agents at the airport. If you didn't like the flight options, please contact our colleagues at the airport, if you are still there. In case you/1

@BalakumarAjith We didn't understand your query. As we can see, your original flight was cancelled due to the weather conditions and the agents at the airport relocated you on the best options available. Here you can check your new flights' details: https://t.co/0Kf2bPHbFt

data.text: @BalakumarAjith Sorry, Ajith. All we did was to provide you with the same information available on your booking management page: https://t.co/0Kf2bPHbFt
@BalakumarAjith We've sent you a new DM. Please check
@PPV128 We have answered to your DM in Spanish, Pablo. Saludos.

data.text: @BalakumarAjith Hola Ajith, could you send us a DM with your Iberia booking code, full name and ticket number? https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@MrTPK Hola. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@billycabral1839 Thanks, Billy

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @willbeck1977 Hello Will, unfortunately we don´t manage the requests from this channel, is our team who will give you an answer after you request a second review. Thank you.
@billycabral1839 Hola Billy, could you give us the details and share your booking code by DM? Thank you.
@OneByJuan Hola, we've just replied your DMs. The refunds have been processed and the receipts sent by email. Please check our DM

@willbeck1977 Hola Will, If you wish to appeal, you need to use the same online form and select 'assistance' as complaint reason, then use the text box to mention your original claim code and the reasons why you disagree with the resolution. Regards.
@DianaViscusi Hola Diana, please send us all the details of this by DM. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@finkouraTh Hola Finkoura, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@Kappers22 Hola Adrienne, we are sorry to read this, please send us all the details by DM. Thank you.
@finkouraTh Hello Finkoura, please check the changes and the available options directly with the agency where you purchased the tickets. Thank you.
@PaulGra00860842 Hola Paul, have you made your request by our online form? Please let us know the details of your file by DM. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@kabu_swe Hola William, we will contact you as soon as we have any update, we appreciate your patience. Regards.

@zackkutos Hola Zack. We are truly sorry to read about that. Could you please, send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with any detail you could consider important so that we could review your case? We remain at your disposal. Regards.
@iampakalo Hola. Could you please give us by DM your PIR code and full passenger name to verify the information? Regards.

@bumblesmcgee Hola Melissa, we inform you that we do not have any incident reported at the moment. We suggest you try to access from another browser or after clearing the cache data and cookies of your default browser. If the error continues, please let us know. Regards.
@KhalidT9 Khalid, we have responded to your direct messages. Let us know in case of any further questions. Regards.
@KhalidT9 Hola Khalid, we do not know the details of the incident. Send us a direct message if there is anything we can help you with from this department. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@CLH92725676 Hola, we are sorry to read your comments. Please send us all the details of the incident by DM to review and help you from this department. We await the information. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@alvarohmaliaga Alvaro, hemos contestado a tu MD. Saludos.
@Drhbuali Hola Hanadi, we have responded to your direct messages requesting additional information. Regards.

@Andrea00593905 Hola Andrea, we understand what you are telling us, however, if our colleagues have already issued a response to your case, we could not tell you anything different. If you disagree with the resolution of the case, you can appeal by filing a new claim. Regards.

@bumblesmcgee Hola Melissa, we would like to have more information about your enquiry. Could you send us a direct message with all the details to review and help you from this department?. Regards.
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@kabu_swe William, from this department we do not have additional information at the moment. Remember that any update will be notified via email or SMS. Regards.
@kabu_swe William, according to our last update, the search for your luggage continues. In case of any update you will be notified via email or SMS. We appreciate your patience, regards.

@PPV128 Pablo, como te indicamos en nuestro mensaje privado la reclamación fue abierta hoy y debes esperar a que sea evaluada. Nuestros compañeros del departamento encargado están trabajando para poder enviarte una resolución. Tan pronto la tengan, te contactarán por mail.
@PPV128 Hola Pablo, desconocemos los detalles de tu caso. Envíanos un MD (https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6) con toda la información sobre lo sucedido para poder ayudarte. Quedamos a tu disposición, saludos.

@elle_griff Hola Elle. Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1UII so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards

@keloram Hola Kelly. We do not have reports on this area, we understand that you're at the checkout area. In this case, we suggest you to clean the cache and the cookies so you'd be able to accept them once again. Also, please check that the website country displays where you are located.

@Delfisanta Hola Delfi. ¿A que correo has escrito y sobre que es tu solicitud? ¿Podrías enviarnos un mensaje directo https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 con los detalles al respecto y así lo podemos verificar desde aquí? Muchas gracias. 
Quedamos a disposición. Un saludo

@s_camaj Hola SCamaj. Are you the owner of the claim? Could you please provide us  the details via direct message with your full name as well  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards

@kabu_swe Hola William. We have never said or neither have a report based on this, as we have mention, a new part of irregularity has been created in order to follow up your incident. You will receive an SMS / Email informing you about your luggage status once the delivery process starts.
@PeledYael Hola Yael. We have answered your direct message informing you on how to proceed. Kind regards,

@mikerico77 Hola Mike. Have you opened an irregularity (PIR) at the airport? could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text:
@erickjmjm Hola JM. You can fill a claim  https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG our Customer Service Team will review what happened and they will contact you directly with a resolution. 
Kind Regards,

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @MyNameisDawew Hello. Thanks for writing to us. You could request a receipt through the following link: https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG If you have any additional questions, please let us know. Kind regards.
@glory_g_u Hola Gloria, envíanos un mensaje directo https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 con más detalles acerca de tu consulta para que podamos ayudarte. Saludos.
@DannaHopper Hello, Danna. We are very sorry for the incident with your luggage. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference code and the full name associated with the claim. Kind regards.
@alisarine Hola Anna, we replied to your direct message with more information on how to proceed in your case. Kind regards.
@PeledYael We remain at your disposal for any further consultation. Regards.
@ChrisMalec13 Hola Chris, please send us a direct message with more information so we can verify the details from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@kayjay_potato Hola, we replied to you again in our conversation by direct message. Kind regards.

@Mr_Courtney Hello. We're sorry to read what you tell us. Have you opened an irregularity (PIR) at the airport? Could you please send us the details via direct message along with your full name so we'd be able to consult from here? Kind Regards. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE

data.text: @extemporea Hola, we're sorry to read this. Since the mask is still mandatory for flights in Spain, we ask our passengers to wear it. Unfortunately, we don't have any info about when the mask won't be mandatory in means of transport in Spain. Kind regards.

data.text: @kayjay_potato Hola, we have sent a reply to your other tweet. Kind regards.

@kayjay_potato Hola, have you opened an irregularity (PIR) at the airport? Could you please provide us the details via direct message along with your full name as well so we'd be able to consult from here? Kind Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@RobLamme Hola Rob, we have sent a response to your direct message requesting some details to continue our follow-up on your case. Kind regards.

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text:
@ChrisMalec13 Hola Chris. You can fill a claim  https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG our Customer Service Team will review what happened and they will contact you directly with a resolution. 
Kind Regards,

@leamingtonkiwi Hola David. Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we'd be able to consult from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards
@dawn_skelton63 Hola Dawn. We are sorry that on this occasion your experience has been negative. From this channel we are at your service for any query. Kind regards.
@Yeliz30170546 Hola Yel, we answered to your direct message, we kindly ask you to keep the conversation on that channel, in order to have all the details in the same chat. Kind regards.

@PeledYael Hola Yael. We understand that the courier service could be arranging the service then. In this case, we suggest you to consult it directly with our luggage centre https://t.co/H2dXd5CH3J Kind regards.

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @PeledYael Hola Yael, as long as you keep the invoices and those are first necessity expenses, you will be able to claim them through our website https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG . Kind regards.
@ktt_jones Hola, we're very sorry to read this. We suggest you to verify the options at your disposal in the airport counters, please let us know if you were able to do so. Best regards.

@CataHerraiza Hola Cata, desconocemos tu caso, si lo deseas puedes darnos una descripción detallada al respecto por mensaje privado para revisar y darte una mejor respuesta. Quedamos atentos por ese medio, saludos. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE

@PeledYael Please keep the invoices for first necessity expenses (clothing, medicines, toiletries), you will be able to claim them. As for your address, you will be able to update it here https://t.co/uE1w4kUiAC . Kind regards.

@PeledYael Hola Yael, unfortunately we wouldn't be able to tell you anything different, your PIR was issued recently and the department in charge will do everything possible to locate your bags at the earliest. Apologies for the inconveniences, best regards.
@PeledYael Thanks for your answer. We have sent you a new DM. Kind regards.
@PeledYael Hello. We are very sorry for the incidence with the luggage. Did you file a claim at the airport? Do you have a PIR reference code? Please send us a DM with all the details. Kind regards.
@asaeman Hola, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@amberwrightxo Hola Amber, we've just replied your DMs. Best regards
@tag_from Sorry to read this. In order to assist you, please send us a DM with more details about your query https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@SeanR1974 Have a great flight, Sean 😀
@honeybadging15 Hola, we're sorry to read this and have just replied your DM. Please check

@Job1208 Hola Job, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your booking code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@eduarixi Hola, puedes probar a solicitarlos en este enlace https://t.co/06AWpCG5Qf adjuntando tu billete y tarjeta de embarque. Gracias. Un saludo
@adetoro2cute Hola Adetoro, thank you for contacting us, we have replied your DM, we'll continue through that channel. Regards

@PrincessDuggan Hola, we understand your frustration, but due to the high volume of requests, the claims department may take a bit longer than normal to deal with the inquiry, we kindly ask you to have patience, regards.
@PrincessDuggan Hola, we can see our team is working on it, have responded to the email they have sent you with the information they asked for? Kind regards.

@2teach_edtech Hola Jenna, we are sorry to hear you have had a bad experience, let us help you by sending us a DM with all the details of your inquiry so we can help you, best regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@b2gTravel Hola, we are sorry you feel that way, is there something we can do to help you? We remain attentive, regards.

@E_l_y_s_e_ Hola Elyse, we don´t know the details about your case. We are going to help you, so please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1UII) with more information that you consider important. We remain at your disposal, kind regards.

data.text: @arjackowiak Hola Alicia, we are sorry to hear this. Did you fill a claim here https://t.co/qlaQPQyv0e? If so, please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1UII) with the case number (P********-********) so we can verify. Regards.
